description: This file defines a helper utility class `ObjectUtils` with static methods for manipulating JSON objects, such as checking for boolean or string entries, creating JSON objects with boolean entries, serializing booleans to strings, and adding boolean entries to JSON objects.
external_files: JsonObject (assumed to be part of the codebase, possibly a framework or library included elsewhere)
Core::JSON::Variant (likely part of a JSON handling library)

classes.name: ObjectUtils
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to work with JSON objects, focusing on boolean and string entries.

methods.name: bool HasBooleanEntry(const JsonObject & obj,const string & key,bool & resultValue)
methods.description: Checks if a JSON object has a boolean value for a given key, and if so, outputs the value.

methods.name: string CreateBooleanJsonString(const string & key,const bool value)
methods.description: Creates a JSON string representing a boolean key-value pair.

methods.name: JsonObject CreateBooleanObject(const string & key,const bool value)
methods.description: Creates a JSON object with a single boolean key-value pair.

methods.name: void AddBooleanEntry(JsonObject & obj,const string & key,const bool value)
methods.description: Adds a boolean key-value pair to an existing JSON object.

methods.name: bool HasStringEntry(const JsonObject & obj,const string & key,string & resultValue)
methods.description: Checks if a JSON object has a string value for a given key, and if so, outputs the value.

methods.name: string BoolToJsonString(const bool value)
methods.description: Converts a boolean value to its string representation 'true' or 'false'.

ctags.name: AddBooleanEntry
ctags.pattern: /^        static void AddBooleanEntry(JsonObject& obj, const string& key, const bool value) {$/

ctags.name: CreateBooleanJsonString
ctags.pattern: /^        static string CreateBooleanJsonString(const string& key, const bool value) {$/

ctags.name: CreateBooleanObject
ctags.pattern: /^        static JsonObject CreateBooleanObject(const string& key, const bool value) {$/

ctags.name: HasBooleanEntry
ctags.pattern: /^        static bool HasBooleanEntry(const JsonObject& obj, const string& key, bool& resultValue)/

ctags.name: HasStringEntry
ctags.pattern: /^        static bool HasStringEntry(const JsonObject& obj, const string& key, string& resultValue/
